snippet: Green Bay Packers Coach Mike McCarthy said he called the replacement referee who made the call on a final play that cost the Packers a game against the Seattle Seahawks to offer his support.
abstract: Green Bay Packers coach Mike McCarthy says he called replacement referee who made call that cost the Packers a win to offer his support; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Green Bay Packers Coach Mike McCarthy said he called the replacement referee who made the call on a final play that cost the Packers a game against the Seattle Seahawks to offer his support.

headline.seo: McCarthy Talks to Referee Who Made Disputed Call
headline.main: Packers Coach Talks to Referee Who Made Disputed Call
